Title: The way night stalker should be played

ItemTooltips.magic_wand: this will get you out of stickier situations than a 20 man bukakke.
ItemTooltips.tango: these veggies give you essential micro nutrients and heal you. quality starting item.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: get this as fast as you can. +24 damage and once you are level 9 it gives you max move speed at night. whoa
ItemTooltips.heart: damage bonus, huge health bonus, imbalanced regen bonus. Pure Tank.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: a nice item to have when there is a lot of magical creatures and stun on the field.
ItemTooltips.rapier: When you are peppering the angus harder than a you would a $5 lady boy from thailand, i suggest to invest in this.
ItemTooltips.basher: +40 damage and a chance to stun? combined this with phase boots HoD early game, you are unstoppable. +93 damage with a .7 AS. ITS IMBALANCED AND PURE ¬ê100% DAMAGE.
ItemTooltips.armlet: i like to get this after heart so you can have it permanently on. More AS more damage more HP. MORE DAMAGE........
ItemTooltips.satanic: Imbalanced brood mother life steal, more HP, more damage............ PURE LIFESTEAL.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: +20 damage and lifesteal. you make this into satanic later. i like to get this second after phase boots.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: The cherry on top of your chadron sundae. +100 damage.... DO I NEED TO SAY HOW PURE THAT IS?
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: The butterfly for strength heroes. QUALITY ITEM.

AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_void: strong nuke. at level 7 you will be smashing everybody with the force of a 1000 manlets.
AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_crippling_fear: 1 point in this will do until later. 5 second silence is more than enough for early/mid game.
AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night: This is why night stalker is all about 110.4532777777% pure damage. when you max this you get max movement speed with phase boots. your Attack speed will be low to mid .7, you guys do the math. those items i suggested +.7 AS+ max move speed= Max Butt Plundering.
AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_darkness: its good to use to keep night time extended. i do not like to use it before level 11 though. some times you have to save some nubbys on your team from dying or escape death yourself.
